languages.text: {n}Агенты ван Калокса обеспечили тщательную проверку, чтобы выявить множество беженцев, успевших добраться до ульев и затаиться там. Запомнившие, как Вольный Торговец обош{mf|елся|лась} с их родней и соседями, они могли бы замыслить месть... если бы не были вышвырнуты в пустоши.{/n}

{n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Агенты ван Калокса обеспечили тщательную проверку, чтобы выявить множество беженцев, успевших добраться до ульев и затаиться там. Запомнившие, как Вольный Торговец обош{mf|елся|лась} с их родней и соседями, они могли бы замыслить месть... если бы не были вышвырнуты в пустоши.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach the hives and hide there. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have planned their revenge... if only they hadn't been thrown out into the wastelands.{/n}

{n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach the hives and hide there. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have planned their revenge... if only they hadn't been thrown out into the wastelands.{/n}

Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}冯·卡洛克斯的特工已经进行了彻底调查，抓住了很多想办法溜进巢都，混迹其中的难民。那些人记住了行商浪人如何对待他们的亲友，打算对行商浪人进行报复……但他们还没来得及动手，就被赶回了废土中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}冯·卡洛克斯的特工已经进行了彻底调查，抓住了很多想办法溜进巢都，混迹其中的难民。那些人记住了行商浪人如何对待他们的亲友，打算对行商浪人进行报复……但他们还没来得及动手，就被赶回了废土中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los agentes de van Calox han llevado a cabo una minuciosa investigación para identificar a muchos de los refugiados que habían conseguido llegar a las colmenas y esconderse en ellas. Recordando cómo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había tratado a sus parientes y vecinos, podrían haber tramado su venganza... si no hubieran sido expulsados a los páramos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los agentes de van Calox han llevado a cabo una minuciosa investigación para identificar a muchos de los refugiados que habían conseguido llegar a las colmenas y esconderse en ellas. Recordando cómo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había tratado a sus parientes y vecinos, podrían haber tramado su venganza... si no hubieran sido expulsados a los páramos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴァン・カロックスの諜報員たちは、ハイヴにたどり着き身を隠すことができた多数の難民を特定するために徹底的な調査を行った。ローグトレーダーが自分たちの親族や知り合いにどんな仕打ちをしたかを思い出し、復讐を企てたのかもしれない...彼らをウエストランドに追放さえしなければ、こうはなっていなかっただろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴァン・カロックスの諜報員たちは、ハイヴにたどり着き身を隠すことができた多数の難民を特定するために徹底的な調査を行った。ローグトレーダーが自分たちの親族や知り合いにどんな仕打ちをしたかを思い出し、復讐を企てたのかもしれない...彼らをウエストランドに追放さえしなければ、こうはなっていなかっただろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les agents de Van Calox ont mené une enquête minutieuse pour identifier de nombreux réfugiés ayant réussi à parvenir jusqu'aux ruches pour s'y cacher. Se souvenant de la façon dont {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a traité leurs proches et leurs voisins, ils auraient pu fomenter un complot pour se venger... s'ils n'avaient pas été expulsés dans les terres désolées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les agents de Van Calox ont mené une enquête minutieuse pour identifier de nombreux réfugiés ayant réussi à parvenir jusqu'aux ruches pour s'y cacher. Se souvenant de la façon dont {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a traité leurs proches et leurs voisins, ils auraient pu fomenter un complot pour se venger... s'ils n'avaient pas été expulsés dans les terres désolées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durch gründliche Nachforschungen konnten Van Calox' Agenten viele der Flüchtlinge identifizieren, denen es gelungen war, sich in einer Makropole zu verstecken. Die Flüchtlinge erinnerten sich daran, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihre Verwandten und Nachbarn behandelt hatte, und hätten Rachepläne schmieden können ... wären sie nicht ins Ödland verbannt worden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch gründliche Nachforschungen konnten Van Calox' Agenten viele der Flüchtlinge identifizieren, denen es gelungen war, sich in einer Makropole zu verstecken. Die Flüchtlinge erinnerten sich daran, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihre Verwandten und Nachbarn behandelt hatte, und hätten Rachepläne schmieden können ... wären sie nicht ins Ödland verbannt worden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Van Calox'un ajanları, kovanlara ulaşıp saklanmayı başaran mültecilerden pek çoğunu tespit etmek için ayrıntılı bir araştırma yürüttüler. Hür Tacir'in hısımlarına ve komşularına nasıl davrandığını unutmayarak intikamlarını planlamış olabilirlerdi. Çorak topraklara sürülmeselerdi belki de planlarını gerçekleştirebilirlerdi...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Van Calox's agents have run a thorough investigation to identify many of the refugees who had managed to reach and hide in the hives. Remembering how the Rogue Trader had treated their relatives and neighbours, they could have plotted their revenge... if only they hadn't been expelled into the wastelands.{/n}
